statements: SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY product_name DESC, price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT inventory_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%' ORDER BY inventory_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 5 AND price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC, product_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM supplier;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY id HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM supplier WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%a%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY product_name
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity, supplier_id FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT procurement_id, item_id, supplier_id, quantity FROM procurement WHERE quantity < 50;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory LIMIT 10;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT inventory.item_name, suppliers.supplier_name FROM inventory JOIN suppliers ON inventory.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT suppliers.supplier_name, procurement.quantity FROM suppliers JOIN procurement ON suppliers.supplier_id = procurement.supplier_id WHERE procurement.quantity > 100;
SELECT item_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY item_id HAVING total_quantity > 50;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_phone FROM supplier WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT procurement_date, quantity FROM procurement WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product WHERE supplier_id = 2 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, quantity, supplier_name FROM inventory INNER JOIN supplier ON inventory.supplier_id = supplier.supplier_id WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, contact_email FROM product INNER JOIN supplier ON product.supplier_id = supplier.supplier_id WHERE price < 50.00 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT procurement_id, procurement_date, product_name, quantity FROM procurement INNER JOIN inventory ON procurement.inventory_id = inventory.inventory_id ORDER BY procurement_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT supplier_name, contact_phone, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM supplier INNER JOIN product ON supplier.supplier_id = product.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name, contact_phone ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT id, product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price < 50.00 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT id, supplier_name, contact_person FROM suppliers WHERE phone_number LIKE '555%';
SELECT order_id, order_date, status FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name DESC, price ASC

SELECT s.supplier_name, i.product_name, os.status FROM suppliers s JOIN inventory_suppliers ins ON s.id = ins.supplier_id JOIN inventory i ON i.id = ins.inventory_id JOIN orders o ON o.inventory_id = i.id JOIN order_status os ON os.order_id = o.order_id WHERE os.status = 'Shipped' ORDER BY o.order_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT supplier_name FROM suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price >= 50 AND quantity > 0
SELECT order_id, quantity_ordered, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY order_date DESC
